price: 107. Bakozalaka kati na yango libela, ndenge likolo na mabele ekowumela, sé kaka oyo Nkolo nayo alingi.(1) ya soló, Nkolo wayo asalaka maye alingi.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
footnotes: 1 Kaka oyo Nkolo nayo alingi: Allah akobimisa na lifelo bandimi oyo bakufaki na masumu mosusu kasi basangisaki Allah te na binzambi nzambi.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā mā dāmati al-samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā shāa rabbuka inna rabbaka faʿʿālun limā yurīdu
